00047     {
00048      static bool init_done = false;
00049      if (!init_done)
00050      {
00051        std::string source;
00052        viennacl::ocl::program prog;
00053        source.append(matrix_align1_trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace);
00054        source.append(matrix_align1_rank1_update);

00062        source.append(matrix_align1_trans_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace);
00063        source.append(matrix_align1_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace);
00064        prog.create(source);
00065 
00066        trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.prepareInit("trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace", prog);
00067        rank1_update.prepareInit("rank1_update", prog);
00068        lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.prepareInit("lower_triangular_substitute_inplace", prog);
